channel.title: Colin on E&C Data Science Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Colin on E&C Data Science Blog

item.description: I am an undergraduate student at Emory University. Data Analytics is my passion; I built this blog to highlight the work I am doing as a Data Analyst. I am interested in Econometrics, Data Privacy, and financial markets. I enjoy spending time in nature when I’m not behind a computer screen. This site is maintained through the Rstats package “Blogdown” and was built by me using Hugo and Netlify.
